author: stas
msg: fix for 5.6.x with perlio enabled. our PerlIO works only with 5.7+, so
check for the perl version in addition to $Config{useperlio}

author: stas
msg: - create MKPATH make variable as we are going to use it more than once
there is no need to test for the existance of the path, before calling
mkpath(), it does no harm if the dir already exists

author: stas
msg: adjustments to the new behavior of Apache->request, which asserts when is
not configured to return the global object

author: stas
msg: expose modperl_global_request (needed in external apps written in XS )
